hedline.hl1: A Swank New Hotel In Beverly Hills

abstract.p: L'Ermitage Beverly Hills, luxury hotel, opens (S)

block.p: The hotel L'Ermitage Beverly Hills opened on April 30 in Beverly Hills near the boutiques and galleries on Rodeo Drive, featuring Art Deco decor, a rooftop pool and large rooms with views of the city, the Getty Museum, Beverly Hills, Bel Air and the Hollywood Hills. The hotel -- formerly L'Ermitage Hotel -- was bought by Lahotel Corporation, which has links with Amanresorts, and has undergone a multimillion-dollar redesign. Rooms have fax machines, computer printers, video and compact disk players, television in the bathrooms and walk-in closets; most also have balconies. Each guest is issued a cellular telephone with a private number.

Public spaces include a living room with a fireplace, a fitness center with steam and massage rooms, and a library. The chef, Serge Falesitch, combines French Provence and Italian Tuscany with Asian influences.
